definition: characterized by the exactness or precision of mathematics
details:
adjective
- characterized by the exactness or precision of mathematics
= example: characterized by the exactness or precision of mathematics
- statistically possible though highly improbable
= example: statistically possible though highly improbable
- beyond question
= example: beyond question
- relating to or having ability to think in or work with numbers
= synonyms: numerical
- of or pertaining to or of the nature of mathematics
= example: of or pertaining to or of the nature of mathematics
